item.title: [j21] Chainer, Nightmare Adept
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Minion

Discard a card: You may cast a creature spell from your graveyard this turn. Activate only once each turn.

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if you didn't cast it from your hand, it gains haste until your next turn.

item.title: [j21] Censor
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [j21] Cemetery Recruitment
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.

item.title: [j21] Celestial Enforcer
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

{1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Activate only if you control a creature with flying.

item.title: [j21] Cathartic Reunion
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.

Draw three cards.

item.title: [j21] Cast Out
item.description:
Enchantment

Flash

When Cast Out enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Cast Out leaves the battlefield.

Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [j21] Carrier Thrall
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Carrier Thrall dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

item.title: [j21] Capture Sphere
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Enchant creature

When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.title: [j21] Captured by Lagacs
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

When Captured by Lagacs enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)

item.title: [j21] Captivating Unicorn
item.description:
Creature — Unicorn

Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [j21] Captain Ripley Vance
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pirate

Whenever you cast your third spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Captain Ripley Vance, then it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

item.title: [j21] Callous Bloodmage
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

When Callous Bloodmage enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

• Exile target player's graveyard.

item.title: [j21] Cabal Initiate
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

Discard a card: Cabal Initiate gains lifelink until end of turn.

Threshold — Cabal Initiate gets +1/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

item.title: [j21] Burrog Befuddler
item.description:
Creature — Frog Wizard

Flash

When Burrog Befuddler enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Burning-Tree Vandal
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [j21] Burn Bright
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Burglar Rat
item.description:
Creature — Rat

When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

item.title: [j21] Burdened Aerialist
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Burdened Aerialist enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Whenever you sacrifice a token, Burdened Aerialist gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Bubble Snare
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)

Enchant creature

When Bubble Snare enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap enchanted creature.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.title: [j21] Bristling Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

When Bristling Hydra enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).

Pay {E}{E}{E}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bristling Hydra. It gains hexproof until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Brineborn Cutthroat
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Pirate

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brineborn Cutthroat.

item.title: [j21] Breya's Apprentice
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Human Artificer

When Breya's Apprentice enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Choose one —

• Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

• Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Bred for the Hunt
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

item.title: [j21] Breathless Knight
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Knight

Flying, lifelink

Whenever Breathless Knight or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature entered from a graveyard or you cast it from a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Breathless Knight.

item.title: [j21] Breaching Hippocamp
item.description:
Creature — Horse Fish

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Breaching Hippocamp enters the battlefield, untap another target creature you control.

item.title: [j21] Boros Elite
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Battalion — Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Bone Shards
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [j21] Bonescythe Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

item.title: [j21] Boneclad Necromancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Boneclad Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [j21] Bonds of Faith
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

item.title: [j21] Bond of Revival
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until your next turn.

item.title: [j21] Bonded Construct
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Bonded Construct can't attack alone.

item.title: [j21] Bogardan Dragonheart
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

Sacrifice another creature: Until end of turn, Bogardan Dragonheart becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4, flying, and haste.

item.title: [j21] Blur Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

item.title: [j21] Blossoming Sands
item.description:
Land

Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.

When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [j21] Bloom Hulk
item.description:
Creature — Plant Elemental

When Bloom Hulk enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [j21] Bloodline Pretender
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

As Bloodline Pretender enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Whenever another creature of the chosen type enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodline Pretender.

item.title: [j21] Bloodhaze Wolverine
item.description:
Creature — Wolverine

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Bloodhaze Wolverine gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Blood Glutton
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [j21] Bloodfell Caves
item.description:
Land

Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.

When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [j21] Bloodchief's Thirst
item.description:
Sorcery

Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)

Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, instead destroy target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [j21] Blood Burglar
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Rogue

As long as it's your turn, Blood Burglar has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [j21] Bloodbraid Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Human Berserker

Bloodbraid Marauder can't block.

Delirium — This spell has cascade as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.title: [j21] Blood Artist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [j21] Blitz Leech
item.description:
Creature — Leech

Flash

When Blitz Leech enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Remove all counters from that creature.

item.title: [j21] Blisterstick Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

When Blisterstick Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

item.title: [j21] Blight Keeper
item.description:
Creature — Bat Imp

Flying

{7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

item.title: [j21] Blighted Bat
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Bat

Flying

{1}: Blighted Bat gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Blazing Rootwalla
item.description:
Creature — Lizard

{R}: Blazing Rootwalla gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [j21] Bladeback Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, Sliver creatures you control have "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker."
